title: I just wanted to play an ARAM...
body:
I didn't have a lot of time so i thought id just play an aram.
I lost count after the 7th or 8th time someone declined or remained inactive when a game was found. 
and i ended up spending 17 minutes waiting for a 20 minute game.

:(

replies.body: Just so we are clear, this timer doesn't count any time your in the Champ select screen, so is likely shorter.
I didn't go into champ select tho, not until 10 people finally said yes, 17 mins in.

Ah ok, normally you've at least hit champ select once by this sort of timer.

But i guess with the Poro King open maybe not.
yea it was unlucky :( it was just every time a match was available someone didnt hit accept.
when you're lower level the ARAM matches are harder to find for some reason. I used to deal with this too. Once had to wait 30 minutes when I was level 6
